channel.title: git on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in git on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 23: Git - with Jesse Liberty and James World
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Jesse Liberty and James World to chat about a topic I’m also personally very passionate about - the Git source control system. Jesse is a fellow podcast host, as well as an author of a book about Git. James is a Solution Architect who has done many a talk on Git and likes to delve a bit deeper into what goes on under the hood (as you’ll see in this episode!
